oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Holograph copy. f. 61r: "hādhihi bi-khaṭṭ al-muʼallif raḥimahu allāh."
Muṭālaʻah note by ʻAlī al-ʻImādī, dated 1175 AH [1761 or 62 AD] on f. 61r.
Cream laid paper with watermark. 21.8 x 16.5 cm. (18.5 x 11 cm.)
Written in one column, 25 lines per page, in black.
Bound with: Hādhihi risālat al-ʻIqd al-thamīn fī sharḥ al-ḥadīth al-musalsal bi-al-Dimashqīyīn (ff. 1r-60v).
MS Arab 218. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
